key.name: window-files
key.description: JSON dump of a dict containing URIs per window to restore when Gedit is started. Values are lists of lists, one list per tab group, each containing a list of file URIs.

key.name: exit-timeout
key.description: Any change in tab states is persisted if Gedit is still running this many seconds later.

key.name: launch-timeout
key.description: If documents have been restored, then a new empty file tab will be suppressed if it is created within this many seconds.
